headline: Walmart (WMT) Coverage Reinstated With Bullish Outlook from BofA
summary: Walmart Inc. (NASDAQ:WMT) is included among the 13 Best March Dividend Stocks to Buy. On February 27, BofA reinstated coverage of Walmart Inc. (NASDAQ:WMT) with a Buy rating. The firm set a price target of $150 on the stock. The analyst said Walmart continues to gain market share, especially among higher-income consumers, helped by faster […]

headline: Walmart FTC Settlement Puts Gig Worker Pay And Valuation In Focus
summary: Walmart (NasdaqGS:WMT) agreed to pay US$100 million to settle a lawsuit with the Federal Trade Commission and 11 states over alleged deceptive practices involving delivery driver pay and tips. The settlement requires Walmart to change how it communicates driver compensation, improve earnings verification, and adhere to new pay transparency and reporting rules for gig workers. The agreement introduces ongoing FTC oversight of Walmart’s compliance with the new standards around driver pay and...
